item.title: Unlocking Free WiFi on British Airways
item.description:
Not bad for free wifi. My guess was that they had a set of whitelisted domains used by messaging apps, and if they see anything else, they just reset the connection. 3 This TLS version forbids renegotiation.

item.title: New OSM file format: 30% smaller than PBF, 5x faster to import
item.description:
